pr_title: Re-enable support for array-valued geo_shape fields.

timeline.message:
Re-enable support for array-valued geo_shape fields.

A regression in the mapping code led to geo_shape no longer supporting
array-valued fields. This commit fixes this support and adds an integration
test to make sure this problem does not return!

timeline.bodyText: This test could also instead live in GeoShapeFieldMapperTests, which is closer to a unit test suite. It seems common to test document parsing logic in *FieldMapperTests.
timeline.author: jtibshirani

timeline.bodyText: I think we need to remove this override and instead  have GeoPointFieldMapper and PointFieldMapper implement it and return true?
timeline.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: woops. jumped on that too fast. you're right
replies.author: talevy

timeline.message: move test to unit tests and resolve overriding method
add unit tests for geoshape-with-doc-values and legacy
